categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi actors

nodes.text: Dirk Yohan Beer (born September 16, 1955), otherwise known as Dickey Beer, worked as a stunt performer on Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi He portrayed four different roles which were that of Barada, Sergeant Junkin, a Stormtrooper and a Biker Scout who was tackled by Ewoks. He also was the stunt double for Jeremy Bulloch's Boba Fett, who he also played in the Ewok mockumentary later included as a easter egg for the 2004 original trilogy DVD releases, and also doubled Luke Skywalker in the same scene.
